citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:42 AM on 31
March 2022. The inspector arrived at the facility at 9:42 AM and called the licensee. The licensee stated they were
unavailable and could not be available within the next 30-45 minutes.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:42 AM on 31 
March 2022. The inspector arrived at the facility at 9:42 AM and called the licensee. The licensee stated they were 
unavailable and could not be available within the next 30-45 minutes. 
 
 
 
End Section
